content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "1/2 cup shortening" )
( ing-2 "1 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-3 "1/2 cup cold water" )
( ing-4 "2 apples" )
( ing-5 "1/3 cup white sugar" )
( ing-6 "1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-7 "1 cup vegetable oil" )

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "sugar"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cinnamon"@17:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a saucepan"@11:21 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "low heat"@25:33 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until soft"@8:18 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "mash"@25:29 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-3-0 "fork"@35:39 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to form a thick applesauce"@40:66 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Add water and mix with fork.
7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Roll out"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "about 1/8 inch thick"@15:35 / OTHER )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a floured board"@39:54 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter).
9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit.
10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork.
11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Heat"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "oil"@9:12 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-11-0 "a large skillet"@16:31 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-11-0 "medium-high heat"@35:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown.
